rules_text: Whenever a creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on AOSE Xenocultivator. If this is the third time this ability resolved this turn, AOSE Xenocultivator deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: [i]“I wanna live a life from a new perspective.”[/i]
notes: New Perspective — Panic! At the Disco
